about-paragraph-1: Hello! I'm Kryštof, an information technology student with a passion for programming, technology, and entrepreneurship. Since a young age, I've been fascinated by the ability to create new things and turn ideas into reality.
about-paragraph-2: Currently, I lead a team working on the educational project Tribity, focusing on teaching programming through gamification and artificial intelligence.
about-paragraph-3: Besides technology, I'm also interested in the world of investments and business. My goal is to continually develop and seek new opportunities that can improve the lives of others.
about-paragraph-4: When I'm not working on my projects, I enjoy spending time in nature and thinking about how to combine modern technology with the peace and simplicity of life.
